title: Vegetable pies with cheese and herb pastry
ingredients: ['PASTRY', '175g plain flour', '85g sunflower or soya spread suitable for baking, chilled and diced', '25g mature Cheddar cheese, finely grated', '2 tbsp snipped fresh chives', 'FILLING', '600ml vegetable stock', '200g broccoli florets', '1 leek, sliced', '200g shelled broad beans', '(fresh or frozen)', '125g shelled peas (fresh or frozen)', '8 cherry tomatoes, halved', '2 tsp cornflour', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley']
